repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3-slim

ARG DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        libpq-dev \
        netcat \
        gcc && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; # need gcc to compile psycopg2

COPY ./ /opt/pgcopy

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -e /opt/pgcopy && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir nose

WORKDIR /opt/pgcopy

CMD nosetests
